name: weather-app-monorepo
description: Weather App with Spring Boot Backend, Angular Frontend, and Ionic Mobile

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:mobile
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mobile
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:mobile"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:mobile
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "Backend,Frontend,Mobile" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:mobile"
scripts.setup:ionic: cd mobile && ionic start weather-mobile-app tabs --type=angular --capacitor --skip-git --package-manager=npm
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:mobile
scripts.clean:mobile: cd mobile && rm -rf dist/ www/ node_modules/ .ionic/

author: Matteo Pezzanera
